open.title: MetroFibre outage | Germiston
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Germiston, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
